alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 26 at 11:56AM EDT until October 26 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Fairfield County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
